name: Night Ministry
description: The Night Ministry provides crisis intervention, counseling and referral services every night of the year. The heart of their work occurs at night. They offer spiritual and emotional care and referral services on the streets, in the middle of the night, every night of the year. They provide companionship to those who are lonely and isolated and they attend to mental and physical needs. They provide harm reduction for those at risk to themselves and others. Offering outdoor services in Christian
